hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
# clean last build work / output [ ! -d rpmbuild/RPMS ] || rm -rf rpmbuild/RPMS [ ! -d rpms ] || rm -rf rpms
EUCALYPTUS_REPO_DIRS=( "eucaconsole" "eucaconsole-selinux" "eucalyptus-cloud-libs" "eucalyptus" "eucalyptus-selinux" ) for EUCALYPTUS_REPO_DIR in "${EUCALYPTUS_REPO_DIRS[@]}"; do [ ! -d "${EUCALYPTUS_REPO_DIR}" ] || rm -rf "${EUCALYPTUS_REPO_DIR}" done
# create rpmbuild dirs [ -d rpmbuild/BUILD ] || mkdir -pv rpmbuild/BUILD [ -d rpmbuild/BUILDROOT ] || mkdir -pv rpmbuild/BUILDROOT [ -d rpmbuild/SPECS ] || mkdir -pv rpmbuild/SPECS [ -d rpmbuild/SOURCE ] || mkdir -pv rpmbuild/SOURCES [ -d rpmbuild/SRPMS ] || mkdir -pv rpmbuild/SRPMS [ -d rpmbuild/RPMS/noarch ] || mkdir -pv rpmbuild/RPMS/noarch [ -d rpmbuild/RPMS/x86_64 ] || mkdir -pv rpmbuild/RPMS/x86_64
# rpm output setup mkdir -vm 777 rpms
# clone repositories git clone --depth 1 --branch devel-4.4 https://github.com/sjones4/eucaconsole.git git clone --depth 1 --branch master https://github.com/eucalyptus/eucaconsole-selinux.git git clone --depth 1 --branch devel-4.4 https://github.com/sjones4/eucalyptus-cloud-libs.git git clone --depth 1 --branch devel-4.4 https://github.com/sjones4/eucalyptus.git git clone --depth 1 --branch master https://github.com/eucalyptus/eucalyptus-selinux.git
# build if [ "true" = "${EUCALYPTUS_GLOBAL_DOCKER_PULLS:-true}" ] ; then docker pull sjones4/eucalyptus-builder:4.4 fi
export RPM_DIST="${EUCALYPTUS_GLOBAL_RPM_DIST:-el7}" if [ ! -z "${BUILD_LABEL}" ] ; then export RPM_BUILD_ID="${BUILD_ID}.${BUILD_LABEL}" else export RPM_BUILD_ID="${BUILD_ID}" fi EUCALYPTUS_BUILD_SCRIPTS=( "build-eucalyptus-console-rpm.sh" "build-eucalyptus-console-selinux-rpm.sh" "build-eucalyptus-cloud-libs-rpm.sh" "build-eucalyptus-rpms.sh" "build-eucalyptus-selinux-rpm.sh" ) for EUCALYPTUS_BUILD_SCRIPT in "${EUCALYPTUS_BUILD_SCRIPTS[@]}" ; do docker run --rm \ --env RPM_DIST \ --env RPM_BUILD_ID \ --env RPM_OUT=/eucalyptus/rpms \ --env RPMBUILD=/eucalyptus/rpmbuild \ -v "$(pwd)":/eucalyptus \ -w /eucalyptus \ sjones4/eucalyptus-builder:4.4 \ "${EUCALYPTUS_BUILD_SCRIPT}" build-only done
# log versions / commits LOG_FILE="build-audit.log" [ ! -f "${LOG_FILE}" ] || rm -f "${LOG_FILE}"
docker images sjones4/eucalyptus-builder | tee "${LOG_FILE}"
# log sources for EUCALYPTUS_REPO_DIR in "${EUCALYPTUS_REPO_DIRS[@]}"; do printf '%-22s' "${EUCALYPTUS_REPO_DIR}" | tee "${LOG_FILE}" git --git-dir="${EUCALYPTUS_REPO_DIR}/.git" log --max-count=1 --pretty=oneline --no-decorate | tee "${LOG_FILE}" done
cat "${LOG_FILE}"
# sign rpms [ ! -z "${GPG_KEY+x}" ] || exit 1 docker run --rm \ --env GPG_KEY \ -v "$(pwd)":/eucalyptus \ -w /eucalyptus/rpms \ sjones4/eucalyptus-builder:4.4 \ rpm-sign.sh
